noWorkoutPlanned: No workout planned for this day.
noCompletedSets: No completed workouts with weight recorded for this period yet.
descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A full body compound exercise.
benchPressDescription: Lay on a flat bench, lower a barbell to your chest, and press it back up.
dumbbellFlyesDescription: Lay on a bench with dumbbells, open your arms wide, and bring them back together over your chest.
pushupsDescription: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, and push back up.
pullupsDescription: Hang from a bar with an overhand grip and pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
bentoverRowsDescription: Bend at your hips and knees, holding a barbell, and pull it towards your stomach.
deadliftsDescription: Lift a loaded barbell off the floor to a standing position, then lower it back down.
squatsDescription: Lower your hips from a standing position and then stand back up.
legPressDescription: Push a weight away from you using your legs on a leg press machine.
lungesDescription: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
overheadPressDescription: Press a barbell or dumbbells from your shoulders up over your head.
lateralRaisesDescription: Raise dumbbells out to your sides up to shoulder level.
bicepCurlsDescription: Curl dumbbells or a barbell up towards your shoulders, working your biceps.
tricepDipsDescription: Using parallel bars or a bench, lower and push up your body with your triceps.
plankDescription: Hold a push-up position, keeping your body in a straight line.
crunchesDescription: Lie on your back and lift your upper body towards your knees.
